content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal Storage and Transfer System at position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5) (empty)
- Wooden chest at position (43.5, -80.5) (contains coal)
- Burner inserter at position (42.5, -80.5) (transfers items between chests)

#### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at position (52.0, -79.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (52.0, -79.0) (out of ingredients)
- Burner inserter at position (53.5, -79.5) (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at position (54.5, -79.5) (contains iron plates)
- Burner inserter at position (55.5, -78.5) (waiting for source items)
- Wooden chest at position (56.5, -78.5) (empty)

#### Iron Ore Mining Operation at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) (empty)
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -48.5) (waiting for source items)
- Burner inserter at position (-12.5, -48.5) (waiting for source items)

#### Resource Storage Hub at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (0.5, 0.5) (contains various resources)
- Wooden chest at position (1.5, 0.5) (contains various resources)
- Wooden chest at position (2.5, 0.5) (contains coal)
- Wooden chest at position (3.5, 0.5) (contains coal)
- Wooden chest at position (4.5, 0.5) (contains coal and iron ore)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5) (contains iron ore, iron plates, and iron gear wheels)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors related to fuel management
- Ensure that all burner entities (e.g., burner inserters, burner mining drills) have sufficient fuel to operate. Regularly check and refill fuel inventories to avoid operational halts.

#### Errors related to item transfer
- Ensure that inserters have access to source items and that their pickup and drop positions are correctly configured. Verify that source chests are not empty and that destination chests are not full.

#### Errors related to mining operations
- Ensure that mining drills have sufficient fuel and that the chests at their drop positions are not full. Empty the chests regularly to allow continuous mining.

#### Errors related to smelting operations
- Ensure that furnaces have both fuel and ingredients to smelt. Regularly check and refill both fuel and ingredient inventories to avoid operational halts.

### NAMESPACE

#### Utility Functions
- None defined yet.

#### Important Variables
- None assigned yet.
